name: Orange Framework
info: These are the main componets of the Orange Framework

cli.help: Show detailed help on all command line interface commands exposed in all packages.
cli.package list: Show package details for all packages.
cli.package dump: Show complete package details for all packages.
cli.package dump {package name}: Show complete package details for {package name}.
cli.cache clear: Clear the Codeigniter cache and local file cache folder.
cli.migration current: This works much the same way as current() but instead of looking for the $config['migration_version'] the Migration class will use the very newest migration found in the filesystem.
cli.migration latest: Migrates up to the current version (whatever is set for $config['migration_version'] in application/config/migration.php).
cli.migration version {#}: Version can be used to roll back changes or step forwards programmatically to specific versions.
